cells.content:
import pandas as pd

# Creating a simple dataset using a dictionary
data = {
    'Name': ['John Doe', 'Jane Doe', 'Jim Brown', 'Jenna Hayes'],
    'Age': [28, 34, 24, 29],
    'City': ['New York', 'Lo Angeles', 'Chicago', 'Houston']
}

# Convert the dictionary into a DataFrame
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# Display the DataFrame
df

data.text/html:
Name Age City
0 John Doe 28 New York
1 Jane Doe 34 Lo Angeles
2 Jim Brown 24 Chicago
3 Jenna Hayes 29 Houston
data.text/plain:
Name  Age        City
0     John Doe   28    New York
1     Jane Doe   34  Lo Angeles
2    Jim Brown   24     Chicago
3  Jenna Hayes   29     Houston
